GameSetting Class
=================
.. py:class:: GameSetting

    This class represents the game settings.

    .. py:attribute:: FPS

        Frames per second.

    .. py:attribute:: TITLE_FPS

        Frames per second for the title screen.

    .. py:attribute:: COUNTDOWN_FPS

        Frames per second for countdown.

    .. py:attribute:: PLAYER_SELECT_FPS

        Frames per second for player selection.

    .. py:attribute:: CREDITS_FPS

        Frames per second for credits.

    .. py:attribute:: LEVEL_OVER_LAG

        Level over lag time.

    .. py:attribute:: TITLE_SCREEN

        Boolean indicating whether the title screen is active.

    .. py:attribute:: COUNTDOWN

        Boolean indicating whether countdown is active.

    .. py:attribute:: PLAYER_SELECT

        Boolean indicating whether player selection is active.

    .. py:attribute:: FULL_SCREEN

        Boolean indicating whether full screen is enabled.

    .. py:attribute:: FRAME_RATE

        Frame rate.

    .. py:attribute:: DIMENSIONS

        Screen dimensions.

    .. py:attribute:: MUSIC_VOLUME

        Volume for music.

    .. py:attribute:: SEGMENT_HEIGHT

        Height of game segment.

    .. py:attribute:: RUMBLE_LENGTH

        Rumble length.

    .. py:attribute:: DRAW_DISTANCE

        Draw distance.

    .. py:attribute:: ROAD_WIDTH

        Width of the road.

    .. py:attribute:: LANES

        Number of lanes.

    .. py:attribute:: BOUNDS

        Bounds.

    .. py:attribute:: TUNNEL_BOUNDS

        Tunnel bounds.

    .. py:attribute:: TUNNEL_HEIGHT

        Tunnel height.

    .. py:attribute:: TUNNEL_LIGHT_FREQ

        Frequency of tunnel lights.

    .. py:attribute:: AUTO_DRIVE

        Boolean indicating whether auto-drive is enabled.

    .. py:attribute:: PLAYER_ANIM_HOLD

        Player animation hold time.

    .. py:attribute:: CHECKPOINT

        Checkpoint value.

    .. py:attribute:: LAP_DIFFICULTY_FACTOR

        Lap difficulty factor.

    .. py:attribute:: LAPS_PER_LEVEL

        Number of laps per level.

    .. py:attribute:: MINIMUM_DIFFICULTY

        Minimum difficulty level.

    .. py:attribute:: MINIMUM_ENGINE_DIST

        Minimum engine distance.

    .. py:attribute:: CRASH_DIVISOR

        Crash divisor.

    .. py:attribute:: POINTS

        Points.

    .. py:attribute:: CHANCE_OF_BONUSES

        Chance of bonuses.

    .. py:attribute:: POINT_GAIN_PROSTITUTE

        Point gain from prostitutes.

    .. py:attribute:: POINT_LOSS_SPRITE

        Point loss for sprites.

    .. py:attribute:: POINT_LOSS_COMP

        Point loss for competitors.

    .. py:attribute:: POINT_MILESTONE

        Point milestone.

    .. py:attribute:: MINIMUM_CORNER_SMOKE

        Minimum corner smoke.

    .. py:attribute:: FIELD_OF_VIEW

        Field of view in degrees.

    .. py:attribute:: CAMERA_HEIGHT

        Camera height.

    .. py:attribute:: CAMERA_DEPTH

        Camera depth.

    .. py:attribute:: BOTTOM_OFFSET

        Bottom offset.

    .. py:attribute:: SPEED_BOOST_DECREASE

        Speed boost decrease.

    .. py:attribute:: SPEED_BOOST_LENGTH

        Speed boost length.

    .. py:attribute:: HARD_TOP_SPEED

        Hard top speed.

    .. py:attribute:: HARD_HANDLING

        Hard handling values.

    .. py:attribute:: HARD_ACCELERATION

        Hard acceleration values.

    .. py:attribute:: PLAYER_Z

        Player Z position.

    .. py:attribute:: FONTS

        Dictionary containing font paths.

    .. py:attribute:: COLOURS

        Dictionary containing color values.

    .. py:attribute:: LEVELS

        List of level dictionaries.

    .. py:attribute:: PLAYERS

        List of player dictionaries.

    .. py:attribute:: SPRITES

        Dictionary containing sprite information.
